avdta.network.link.transit

Class WalkingLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.link.transit.TransitLink
      • avdta.network.link.transit.WalkingLink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WalkingLink
extends TransitLink
    This link represents a traveler walking along a main link. Its purpose is to increase connectivity between bus stops and traveler origins/destinations. Walking has a high travel time, though, so it has a high disutility.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getTT

        public double getTT(int dtime)
        Returns the expected travel time. Travel times are constant and based on the WALKING_SPEED.
        Specified by:
        getTT in class TransitLink
        Parameters:
        dtime - the departure time
        Returns:
        length / WALKING_SPEED
